Submodules¶

plugins.abstract_plugin module¶

class plugins.abstract_plugin.AbstractPlugin(dm4l, config)¶

Bases: object

Abstract Plugin class. It receives the powers of dark magic and a configuration dictionary. Users should override the update method for the desired functionality.

set_config(key, value)¶

Change a configuration parameter.

Parameters:
  • key – string name of the parameter.
  • value – value to change.
Returns:
update(ids=[])¶

Should be implemented by the user. Performs the main function.

Parameters:ids – list of ids of the target log handlers.
Returns:
